overview:
Penrod Pooch (Penry for short) is a mild mannered canine janitor at a police station and whenever help is needed he dives into a file cabinet and emerges as a karate fighting, super hero named Hong Kong Phooey.

Accompanied by his trusty feline companion Spot, Hong Kong Phooey fights crime while double checking his trusty textbook The Hong Kong Book of Kung Fu.Bumbling through solving crimes it is Spot who is inaudibly muttering the clues while Penry takes credit.

episodes.title: The Phoo-nomenon
episodes.description: Documentary of the show from its development through its legacy

episodes.title: The Batty Bank Gang (The Complete Story Board)
episodes.description: Production designs and never before seen original artwork as well as new interviews "Hong Kong Phooey - The Batty Bank Gang: The Complete Storyboard" {RT 11:56 Motion Screen to storyboard comparison from the cartoon "The Batty Bank Mob"}

episodes.title: The Claw/Hong Kong Phooey vs Hong Kong Phooey (with audio commentary)
Car Thieves
episodes.description: A stolen car ring is operating in town, and it's up to Hong Kong Phooey to break through the ring's sneaky secrets and stop them in their fiendish tracks. Meanwhile, Sarge is expecting the Commissioner to stop by, so he wants Penry to have the police station cleaned up before he arrives.

episodes.title: Zoo Story
episodes.description: Hong Kong Phooey must try to find out where a missing Hopeless Diamond is located, which may tie into a string of Kangaroos being stolen. The Commissioner stops by, and looks like Sarge is in trouble for not doing his share of cleaning.

episodes.title: Iron Head, the Robot
episodes.description: When a crook commands his robot to steal every safe in town, Hong Kong Phooey gives chase-- resulting is a showdown in the crooks's gym. Meanwhile, Sergeant Flint starts off a Physical Fitness program with Rosemary, Spot and Penry.

episodes.title: Cotton Pickin' Pocket Picker
episodes.description: While at a janitors convention at Miami Beach, Hong Kong Phooey (and Spot) must catch a man who's pick pocketing all the vacationers.

episodes.title: Grandma Goody (Cat Burglar)
episodes.description: This time, cats are being stolen all over town (including Spot) -- and Grandma Goody is not what she seems, as Hong Kong Phooey finds out in a bubble-filled climax. It's also Sergeant Flint's birthday, so Rosemary ask Penry to purchase a few things for his surprise birthday party.

episodes.title: Candle Power
episodes.description: A scheme to steal every candle in town and melt them down to create statues, keeps Hong Kong Phooey wondering what's going on. It's going to be harder to celebrate Sarge's birthday without candles on his birthday cake.

episodes.title: The Penthouse Burglaries
episodes.description: A gorilla robbing penthouses? Hong Kong Phooey and Spot go bananas trying to solve this crime. Penry is giving the Police Station walls a new coat of paint.

episodes.title: Batty Bank Mob
episodes.description: A string of bank robberies located by the ocean, leads Hong Kong Phooey on an underwater chase with the help of an octopus.

episodes.title: The Voltage Villain
episodes.description: Hong Kong Phooey must solve a string of robberies being made by machines. This leads to a final battle between Hero and machine. Meanwhile, Sarge, as well as Spot, have taken up the hobby of building ships and building with toothpicks.

episodes.title: The Giggler
episodes.description: Hong Kong Phooey must stop a clown from stealing mink stoles from the rich. But The Giggler always leaves them laughing.

episodes.title: The Gumdrop Kid
episodes.description: Hong Kong Phooey must stop the Gumdrop Kid from stealing every piece of candy in the city.

episodes.title: Professor Presto (The Malevolent Magician)
episodes.description: A professional magician has stolen the police payroll and Hong Kong Phooey must try to get it back, leading him to the Presto's house of magic.

episodes.title: TV or Not TV
episodes.description: A bunch of TVs are being stolen all over town and Hong Kong Phooey must stop them before they escape out to sea.

episodes.title: Stop Horsing Around
episodes.description: Horses are being stolen which leads our hero to a 3 ring circus where he turns out to be the main attraction.

episodes.title: Mirror, Mirror, on the Wall
episodes.description: Mirrors are being stolen and used to fool people into thinking they are taller, smaller, skinnier and fatter. Hong Kong Phooey must battle them in the house of mirrors.

episodes.title: Great Movie Mystery
episodes.description: Hong Kong Phooey gets tricked into robbing a bank thinking he was an actor in a movie. Now he must escape jail to clear his name.

episodes.title: The Claw
episodes.description: A mechanical claw is stealing all over town and Hong Kong Phooey must destroy the dreaded claw machine before it's too late. Meanwhile, Penry is fixing the Sargents desk lamp, but keeps on making the problems worse then before.

episodes.title: Hong Kong Phooey vs. Hong Kong Phooey
episodes.description: A Hong Kong Phooey impersonator is accepting rewards that Hong Kong Phooey is supposed to recieve. Our hero must unmask this villian.

episodes.title: The Abominable Snowman
episodes.description:
The Abominable Snowman is stealing ski lift equipment to make his own ski lodge. Hong Kong Phooey must battle the icy cold to thwart the Snowman's plans.

Meanwhile, the Sarge is studying for his Captains exam, and can't get the peace and quiet he needs to study thanks to Penry.

episodes.title: Professor Crosshatch
episodes.description: A mad scientist has created a giant bird with superhero powers to steal. Hong Kong Phooey must do battle with this indestructable bird. We find out Penry is allergic to feathers, making it even harder for Sarge to pass his Captain's exam.

episodes.title: Goldfisher
episodes.description:
Fish are being stolen from lakes all over town and, as usual, our superhero is called on to solve this fish story.

Penry loses Sarges boots (out the window) by testing out his latest invention, an automatic shoe polisher. We find out Rosemary's fish, Emma Jean, won't eat because she is in love with Sargent Flint's stuffed fish.

episodes.title: Green Thumb
episodes.description: Our hero must try to find the commisioners plants that were stolen by Green Thumb. The leads our hero to Green Thumb's Greenhouse. Penry gives it another try with his latest invention, a super-duper battery powered mop.

episodes.title: From Bad to Verse (Rotten Rhymer)
episodes.description:
The Rotten Rhymer is stealing the most valuable books in the city. Hong Kong Phooey must visit the Rhymers library and revocer all the stolen books.

Penry is patching a spot on the wall, but seems to get distracted in in the process.

episodes.title: Kong and the Counterfeiters
episodes.description: A string of counterfeit bills are being used all over the city. This leads Penry/Hong Kong Phooey and Rosemary [while on a picnic with Penry] to the crooks hideout where they must escape captivity.

episodes.title: The Great Choo Choo Robbery
episodes.description: Someone is robbing trains and Rhinestone Jim Shady is the suspect. Hong Kong Phooey must track him down and stop him. Penry in the meantime, is growing plants to use for a soup.

episodes.title: Patty Cake, Patty Cake, Bakery Man
episodes.description: A man uses bakery dough to rob people of their jewelry and other valuables. Hong Kong Phooey goes to the crooks lair posing as a delivery man. Penry is building a scarecrow to keep birds away from his crop.

episodes.title: Mr. Tornado
episodes.description: Someone is using a mysterious wind machine to blow open bank vaults and robbing the payroll. Hong Kong Phooey Goes to England to find the answers. Meanwhile, Sargant Flint wants Penry to clean his uniform before the Policeman's Ball on Saturday, but Penry keeps having trouble in doing so.

episodes.title: The Little Crook Who Wasn't There
episodes.description: A string of robberies are being commited by an invisible robber. How can Hong Kong Phooey fight what he can't see? Penry is still having trouble in fixing the Sarge's suit.

episodes.title: Dr. Disguiso
episodes.description: A prowler uses mysterious disguises to steal. Hong Kong Phooey must try to unmask this robber. Could it be Sarge or Rosemary? Penry is trying to find gold or silver with a metal detector, but it finds Sarge's badge instead.

episodes.title: The Incredible Mr. Shrink
episodes.description: Mr. Shrink is flooding the city to aide in his crime spree. This puts our hero up to his neck in water trying to stop him. Penry is making a few adjustments to his metal detector, making sure that it will only locate gold.

episodes.title: Comedy Cowboys
episodes.description: Tin Nose, a conniving cowboy of crime, frames Hong Kong Phooey for the theft of a rare map to The Lost Dutchman Mine from a museum. It's up to Western superheroes Honcho, The Mystery Maverick, and Posse Impossible to help corral Tin Nose and clear Hong Kong's name.
